item.description:
Back for year 2! TTDB has teamed up again with Boston Ski and Sports Club to invite our members to join up to 1000 other young professionals on The Rock the Boat Harbor Cruise.

Join the group aboard one of Boston’s finest, the Provincetown II. Our travels will take us on a three hour cruise around Boston Harbor viewing the illuminated Boston skyline and beautiful harbor islands. All this while enjoying three fully stocked cash bars and three spacious decks to socialize with other young professionals.

The entertainment will consist of The Scooby Snax, playing music from the 80's to now. In addition, the second deck will feature Club DJ Mike Gioscia (Tequila Rain & The Joshua Tree) spinning today’s hottest hits and the third floor is at your discretion.

Boarding:
7:30PM on “Provincetown II” at Commonwealth Pier near World Trade Center in Boston. (Cash bar opens 7:30PM) Cruise 8:00PM to 11:00PM. Rain or shine, 21+ ID required.


Suggested Attire: "Dress to Impress"

Directions: http://maps.google.co...

Enter: Commonwealth Pier in Boston

Select "Get Directions To Here"
item.name: Rock the Boat Harbor Cruise
